Title: ExpanderRT
Description: Due to the lack of Expander controller that is compatible with WinRT, I decided to port the ExpanderView from the Windows Phone toolkit.
HomeWiki:
ExpanderRT

Due to the lack of Expander controller that is compatible with WinRT, I decided to port the ExpanderView from the Windows Phone toolkit. This ExpanderRT is functional in Windows Phone 8, Windows 8.1 and universal apps.

To use/modify the the ExpanderRT just copy the code inside the 2 sub/folders (ExpaControl and ExpaResource) from the Shared folder.

DreamNet
